message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at an introductory price of $8500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can discuss the details further.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, I am looking for a more budget-friendly solution. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6000 for your product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm committed to finding a solution that works for both of us. To address your concerns, I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $7000 for the product. This still reflects the value we place on it, while making it more accessible to you. I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget requirements. I would like to counterpropose a price of $6500 for your product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After considering your proposal, I've decided to counteroffer at $7250 for the product. This price reflects its value and quality while remaining competitive. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer to a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to counterpropose a price of $6800 for your product.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I understand your position and would like to present a counteroffer of $7100 for the product. This price is reflective of its value and quality, while also accommodating your financial considerations. I hope this proposal will facilitate a successful conclusion to our negotiations.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price. I would like to counterpropose a price of $6900 for your product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've considered your proposal carefully and am willing to counteroffer at $7050 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on it while also being responsive to your financial needs. I hope this will lead to a satisfactory conclusion to our discussions.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counterpropose a final price of $6950 for your product.
